EmailTemplate.name: RE: Turbonomic Material for Review (1494250680.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Turbonomic Material for Review (1494250680.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean DocumentEmail false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Tim, I wanted to touch base with you and see if now might be a good time to take another look at Turbonomic and see some of the improvements we’ve made to our platform since taking a look in 2015. One of the big initiatives for us in 2015/2016 was to have direct ties in the AWS, Azure and other public cloud providers so that teams can properly optimize/plan for the hybrid cloud infrastructure. I’ve copied a brief rundown below but let me know if this is something you would be interested in reviewing further. Autonomic Platform for AWS <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE1Xc8TKI1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhXDU66Sxv%2DgbPKIYJcdvJm1cU8r%2D6gwHQXq4CvpmmcD2cgWUg%2DaA2tXZZyqSfjaJIUeROF3XfKBbMWyQUFrO8pzJH4UYeW8l2U9lDoyxCXGlgtsPuvz0uQOLBwtuAztHh2xlwJScWkziyX25IvhHU90tZuj04%5Fr%5F1%5FBt1S2D6cWnbv97aqFrxfaofjk%2D%5FYqv8kNgo2vKg7QjyIPV2bIduhdC0oxBi5wBwdIS1sLxFOIMocghPXkypZJMUeRHLgnxBx3Hkl4ple576tuga5UmjpMRKvmCez2wqtD9ED9S2HsvgGtC7waBfXx91zUxf1U6uZ6gg%2C/jU1QdsHNLFlNoVdlsbPWN7vhmzDGf5a7vvJtG%5Fjp1N8x0EZqPO%5FANQ752pxEDp5tcLSWFRYAAN0y4TNnDvWHfo9O9fhUCA%2DxVzbAl7GXPalNfrpn2c91wL211G8Ers69pkneC0AAT3xlZ0vPTbkvlnC1FLEUbE7V3l%5FAIYZuzgw7jbgBwty7ebXy%2Dn6wrkCbyCKjEnB6osCW%2Dge%5FUaw6vIc5lWAJ4HUtQtimxBTg2J8J%5Fhd99OFn1g4y8d9fbcxA8RywXz3U95byHd9%2DSISiia%5FqqKUfSREBuI8cXkaCOEGdMJq%2DemRw%5FAPXm2g9IwE3FiVwA%5FUrxwTIn3VReMAZFRmQyzwhx0ssgIBd%2DaPKvyCEJXryaDGm5xGm21SzdNIP8HGozd1zxBrVIjbm9uBMAHGgCaSMhEKbYIXukBAhQ8VbbJAeI7CI7v37xdks%5FCCJcE2f0M%2DFERdxYb02hfinks%2D9ntCBp1%5FmuBp%5F1wF4Mjty7hXib5%2D%5FPAB39rO8oJXvqJOa9nQQ%5FFpOIxYHtg3ka90R1wn0]]> Best, James From: Timothy Poulos [mailto:Timothy.Poulos@tampagov.net] Sent: Tuesday, January 24, 2017 4:39 PM To: James Wilcox <james.wilcox@turbonomic.com> Subject: RE: Turbonomic Material for Review Hi James, Eric forwarded me the information you sent him. I believe Turbonomic used to be called VM Turbo. We ran a 30 day trial of this product in our environment a year ago or so. It is a very good product, but we’ve got a lot of tools in place, and didn’t feel it would be worth it for us to deploy it. Thanks for forwarding us this information! Tim PoulosNetwork Supervisor From: James Wilcox [mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]>] Sent: Monday, January 23, 2017 12:06 PM To: Eric Hayden <Eric.Hayden@tampagov.net <[[mailto:Eric.Hayden@tampagov.net]]>> Subject: RE: Turbonomic Material for Review Hi Eric, Hope you had a great weekend. I just wanted to follow up with you to see if you have had a chance to take a look at the material and what your thoughts were if so. Do you have fifteen minutes to walk through the material with me and discuss how Turbonomic’s different approach to optimizing you’re infrastructure can help with cost savings within City of Tampa’s infrastructure? I promise it will be worth your time. Thanks! James From: James Wilcox Sent: Monday, January 9, 2017 10:34 AM To: 'eric.hayden@tampagov.net' <eric.hayden@tampagov.net <[[mailto:eric.hayden@tampagov.net]]>> Subject: Turbonomic Material for Review Hi Eric, Thanks for taking the time to speak with me today. As discussed, I’ve included some material that digs deeper into Turbonomic and the benefits our customers see. Somewhat recently, the team at City of Miami implemented Turbonomic into their infrastructure and were able to consolidate their physical and virtual environment because Turbonomic used intelligent automation to properly size and place each workload within their environment. This saved them a lot of money on licensing and hardware spend. City of Garland Saves with Turbonomic <[[https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__turbonomic.com_wp-2Dcontent_uploads_Turbonomic-2DCityGarland-2DSuccess-2DStory.pdf&d=DwMFAg&c=XqATCztIzLCYon5OykG81w&r=RXsTXMj4-AHebXOOc4gPI911r9d2tYhddCRZXQqQtBU&m=L5lcUhwfijSXCmVKizOnPS7pHQRDDt20sok0D99s4hs&s=7r60HQdg-QazVknImRMyc4eEMPVl_BiL59FYp-fCuPg&e=]]>Turbonomic ROI <[[https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__turbonomic.com_wp-2Dcontent_uploads_Turbonomic-5FROI.pdf&d=DwMFAg&c=XqATCztIzLCYon5OykG81w&r=RXsTXMj4-AHebXOOc4gPI911r9d2tYhddCRZXQqQtBU&m=L5lcUhwfijSXCmVKizOnPS7pHQRDDt20sok0D99s4hs&s=37Pk48TkoyTqH5ZtsA1gSF6zaHQbCftpx2AEbprebbE&e=]]> Also, below is the 30 day free trial as well just in case you decide you’d like to take a look at the technology. If you decide you would like to look into it a little bit further with an engineer let me know and I would be happy to set that up for you. 30 Day Free Trial <[[https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__turbonomic.com_downloads_turbonomic-2D30-2Dday-2Dtrial_&d=DwMFAg&c=XqATCztIzLCYon5OykG81w&r=RXsTXMj4-AHebXOOc4gPI911r9d2tYhddCRZXQqQtBU&m=L5lcUhwfijSXCmVKizOnPS7pHQRDDt20sok0D99s4hs&s=YhxWBzf90QCTYIPRP1CKHuKkzRE8ioOsu3_Y6TI1IiY&e=]]> Best regards, James Wilcox Sales Representative – Southeast Turbonomic <[[https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__turbonomic.com_product_-23lower-2Dinfrastructure-2Dcosts&d=DwMFAg&c=XqATCztIzLCYon5OykG81w&r=RXsTXMj4-AHebXOOc4gPI911r9d2tYhddCRZXQqQtBU&m=L5lcUhwfijSXCmVKizOnPS7pHQRDDt20sok0D99s4hs&s=0ZI4zTqfv8SGboJB7xINyVcxPdlwDv6H_1ZDp0Umsn8&e=]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]> This message and its attachments are intended only for the designated recipient(s). It may contain confidential or proprietary information and may be subject to legal or other confidentiality protections.
